title: Active Self-Reward System Control Education Using Model-Free Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners understand basic concepts of multi-axis control systems and have an environment enabling practice-oriented learning in VR simulation settings

learning_goals: Learners explain the principles of Q-learning-based LQR controllers and implement them in a simulation environment
Learners identify inter-axis coupling phenomena in multi-axis systems and design control strategies using coupling-aware matrices
Learners evaluate and improve decoupling control algorithms for 3-axis self-compensating systems using VR-based simulation tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
